== MEMO ==

 * .xlsm file is actually zip file. It contains  customUI.xml file where the custom ribbon interface is defined. And vbaProject.bin contains VBA scripts.

{{{
\
│  [Content_Types].xml
│
├─customUI
│      customUI.xml   <*>
│
├─docProps
│      app.xml
│      core.xml
│
├─xl
│  │  styles.xml
│  │  vbaProject.bin <*>
│  │  workbook.xml
│  │
│  ├─theme
│  │      theme1.xml
│  │
│  ├─worksheets
│  │      sheet1.xml
│  │      sheet2.xml
│  │      sheet3.xml
│  │
│  └─_rels
│          workbook.xml.rels
│
└─_rels
        .rels
}}}
